query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Article as a WHERE a.rootQuestionId = ?1
SELECT MAX(a.number) FROM Article as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM ArticleComment AS c WHERE c.articleId = ?1 order by c.createDateTime desc
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM ArticleRelated AS r WHERE r.relatedArticleId = ?1 AND r.companyId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM ArticleRating AS r WHERE r.userId = ?1 AND r.articleId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(articleCategory) FROM ArticleCategory AS articleCategory WHERE articleCategory.companyId = ?1

query.description: List all cases by product that not are close
query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(sc) FROM SupportCase as sc WHERE sc.companyId=?1 and sc.state.stateType = 1 and sc.state.stageType<>2 and sc.productId=?2

query.description: List all cases that not are close
query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(sc) FROM SupportCase as sc WHERE sc.companyId=?1 and sc.state.stateType = 1 and sc.state.stageType<>2
SELECT MAX(a.number) FROM SupportCase as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(sc) FROM SupportCase as sc WHERE sc.addressId=?1 and sc.contactPersonId IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(sc) FROM SupportCase as sc WHERE sc.addressId=?1 and sc.contactPersonId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM SupportCaseType as s WHERE s.companyId=?1
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM State as s WHERE s.companyId=?1 and s.stateType = ?2 and s.stageType=0
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM State as s WHERE s.companyId=?1 ORDER BY s.sequence ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM SupportCaseActivity as a WHERE a.caseId=?1 and a.isOpen=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM SupportCaseWorkLevel as a WHERE a.companyId=?1 ORDER BY a.sequence ASC
SELECT OBJECT(su) FROM SupportUser as su WHERE su.productId=?1 and su.companyId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(su) FROM SupportUser as su WHERE su.companyId=?1
SELECT OBJECT(su) FROM SupportUser as su WHERE su.companyId=?1 and su.companyId=?2 and su.companyId=?3
SELECT OBJECT(sc) FROM SupportContact as sc WHERE sc.caseId=?1
SELECT OBJECT(sc) FROM SupportContact as sc WHERE sc.caseId=?2 and sc.activityId=?1
SELECT OBJECT(sc) FROM SupportContact as sc WHERE sc.contactId=?1 and sc.companyId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(sc) FROM SupportCaseSeverity as sc WHERE sc.companyId=?1 ORDER BY sc.sequence ASC
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM UserArticleAccess AS u WHERE u.articleId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM UserArticleAccess AS u WHERE u.userGroupId = ?1
